data.title: Various Artists: Four Classic Christmas Albums Plus (Ella Wishes You A Swinging Christmas / Christmas Carousel / Sings Christmas Songs / A Merry Christmas) (2CD)
data.text:
£6.99 each

AVID Jazz presents the third release in AVIDs Christmas Classic Album series with a re-mastered 2CD release featuring four Christmas Jazz albums plus by Ella Fitzgerald, Peggy Lee, Charles Brown, Stan Kenton and Sidney Bechet complete with original artwork and liner notes.

From 1960 Ella Wishes You A Swinging Christmas; Peggy Lee also from 1960 Christmas Carousel; the great unsung jazz and soul singer Charles Brown from 1961 Sings Christmas Songs; Stan Kenton offering a smooth A Merry Christmas and as a bonus E.P. legendary hornman Sidney Bechet gets festive from 1958 Joue Noel. You may think that the jazz scene is full of extremely cool characters playing crazy music in smoky bars and clubs and wearing shades with sharp suits and dresses. Actually you may well be right, but one thing we are sure they all have in common is .. a love for Christmas! Surely not we hear you cry! But take a listen to our next five selections and we think you will hear what we are talking about. Five very different approaches to Christmas is just what you would expect from a Jazz Christmas party. And that is just what you get with these classic seasonal suggestions!

Merry Christmas!

CD1

1-12: Ella Fitzgerald: Ella Wishes You A Swinging Christmas

1. Jingle Bells

2. Santa Claus Is Coming To Town

3. Have Yourself A Merry Little Christmas

4. What Are You Doing New Years Eve?

5. Sleigh Ride

6. The Christmas Song

7. Good Morning Blues

8. Let It Snow! Let It Snow! Let It Snow!

9. Winter Wonderland

10. Rudolph The Red-Nosed Reindeer

11. Frosty The Snowman

12. White Christmas

13-24: Peggy Lee: Christmas Carousel

13. I Like A Sleighride

14. The Christmas Song

15. Dont Forget To Feed The Reindeer

16. The Star Carol

17. The Christmas List

18. Christmas Carousel

19. Santa Claus Is Coming To Town

20. The Christmas Waltz

21. The Christmas Riddle

22. The Tree

23. Deck The Halls

24. White Christmas

CD2

1-12: Charles Brown: Sings Christmas Songs

1. Please Come Home For Christmas

2. Christmas With No One To Love

3. Christmas In Heaven

4. Christmas Blues

5. Its Christmas All Year Round

6. Wrap Yourself In A Christmas Package

7. Merry Christmas Baby

8. Its Christmas Time

9. Christmas Comes But Once A Year

10. Christmas Question

11. Lets Make Every Day A Christmas Day

12. Bringing In A Brand New Year

13-23: Stan Kenton: A Merry Christmas

13. O Tannebaum

14. The Holly And The Ivy

15. We Three Kings Of Orient Are

16. Good King Wenceslas

17. The Twelve Days Of Christmas

18. Once In Royal Davids City

19. God Rest Ye Merry Gentlemen

20. O Come, All Ye Faithful

21. Angels, We Have Heard On High

22. O Holy Night

23. Christmas Medley: Joy To The World / Away In A Manger / The First Noel / We Wish You A Merry Christmas / Hark! The Herald Angels Sing / Silent Night

24. Silent Night from Sidney Bechet: Joue Noel

25. Blues Du Papa Noel from Sidney Bechet: Joue Noel

26. Spirit Holiday from Sidney Bechet: Joue Noel

27. White Christmas from Sidney Bechet: Joue Noel
